messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Moving to Germany
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/14/04 6:50:20 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... When we went I left my cats with my parents and they shipped them.  Call the airports and ask
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/14/04 6:50:20 AM Eastern Standard Time,
WendyWCarr@... writes:

> Its such a mess. Im so mad! We have 2 cats! They can go, but they cant
> leave
> for 30 days after getting a rabies shot...my husband may be leaving in 7
> days!
>
>
>

When we went I left my cats with my parents and they shipped them. Call the
airports and ask about it, they do need special papers from the vets etc.
They made it just fine. Maybe you have a friend where you are now that could help
out.
Pam G

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Moving to Germany
messages.msgSnippet: HUGS!!! Wendy, I SOOOOO understand!!! I grew up military (in fact, I spent time at the now closed 19th Army General Hospital in Frankfurt). Best thing I can
messages.messageBody:
HUGS!!! Wendy, I SOOOOO understand!!! I grew up military (in fact, I spent time at the now closed 19th Army General Hospital in Frankfurt). Best thing I can suggest is to re-up and be with him, look at it as an adventure and enjoy it!!

Wow...7 days?! That's some SERIOUS short-timing!!! Had there been a possibility of this transfer or is it truly out of the blue? I'm more familiar with the Navy and Coast Guard, so I'm just wondering.

By the way..when my mother was offered the job in Bermuda (working civil-service for the Navy's fire department as a fire inspector)..they called on Friday, gave her 24 hours to decide and 48 hours to get there. She needed to start work on Monday. We got home from camp that day, she asked our opinions...we were all for it...and she called my dad and said "Come get the kids, I'll call you when I have a house for us." Saturday afternoon we were living in Virginia Beach, Sunday the movers packed our stuff and put it in storage.

Elizabeth

Wendy Carr <WendyWCarr@...> wrote:
They just told my husband that they are making him go to Germany even though
he is getting out of the army in 2 years...they told him he either has to go
alone for 2 years, or re-enlist and we can go with him.... This sucks so
bad. We wanna buy a house and get out of the army....not go to Germany. I
dont understand how they can make him go when he doesnt have enough time to
meet the required tour. Its a 3 year tour... he gets out in 2 years...

I am so mad!!!

I know Germany will be cool and pretty and an awesome homeschooling
oppertunity (sp) but damn it, this sucks big time... they want us to move in
7 days.....
theres no way!!!!!!!!!

Wendy

Wendy Carr
When the first baby laughed for the first time, the laugh broke into a
thousand pieces and they all went skipping about, and that was the beginning
of fairies. - Barrie
Mom to Austyn(8) and Caitlin(5 months)

messages.subject: Moving to Germany
messages.msgSnippet: They just told my husband that they are making him go to Germany even though he is getting out of the army in 2 years...they told him he either has to go alone
messages.messageBody:
They just told my husband that they are making him go to Germany even though
he is getting out of the army in 2 years...they told him he either has to go
alone for 2 years, or re-enlist and we can go with him.... This sucks so
bad. We wanna buy a house and get out of the army....not go to Germany. I
dont understand how they can make him go when he doesnt have enough time to
meet the required tour. Its a 3 year tour... he gets out in 2 years...

I am so mad!!!

I know Germany will be cool and pretty and an awesome homeschooling
oppertunity (sp) but damn it, this sucks big time... they want us to move in
7 days.....
theres no way!!!!!!!!!

Wendy
